snippet.title: Sonic Dark Abyss - First Zone Reveal
snippet.description:
This Zone is notable for having a Turquoise hue in the area! As the island is known as "The Island of Illusions", this area may look like the Green Hill Zone, based off appearance. However, with the illusions taking place, nobody knows what it truly looks like. Many flowers and regular trees appear here, making the area more beautiful, along with a beach and forest. It is home to a light-filled portal that leads somewhere...


Follow the game for updates:
https://gamejolt.com/games/darkabyss/473710
